item.title: Flying into the sun’s corona
item.description:
Paul Byrne on Twitter

“This is what it looks like to fly through the Sun’s corona. We’ve never seen this before—but the Parker Solar Probe did during its closest flyby of the Sun yet, when it flew just 13 million km above the surface of our star. And look out for the Milky Way in the background... https://t.co/vzATezKA…

URL: https://twitter.com/ThePlanetaryGuy/status/1471338963772321795?t=rvZ_slx4O5tihMWjRCm35g&s=09

source: Saturday assorted links
